Haiti's top gang leader threatens politicians, capital jail on fireA powerful gang leader in Haiti has issued a threatening message aimed at political leaders who would take part in a still unformed transition council for the country, which has been rocked by escalating violence in recent weeks. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 15:34:11 GMT BAZTCRYPTVL2NCELN4DN5XQTIA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/haitis-top-gang-leader-threatens-politicians-capital-jail-fire-2024-03-14/Harold Isaac世界美洲
India fills election board ahead of vote date announcementIndia appointed two officials as election commissioners on Thursday, filling vacant spots in the three-person body ahead of an expected announcement of a date for a national election likely to be won by incumbent Prime Minister Narendra Modi. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 15:33:28 GMT 4YKJG2DR2NPSDHNOHA7WMO65NA https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-fills-election-board-ahead-voting-date-announcement-2024-03-14/Reuters世界印度
Magnitude 5.8 earthquake hits Japan's FukushimaAn earthquake with a preliminary magnitude of 5.8 hit eastern Japan early on Friday, the Japan Meteorological Agency said. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 15:31:55 GMT 6EYTEKNDQNO7FGUKSVLFBDJSSU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/magnitude-58-earthquake-hits-japan-fukushima-2024-03-14/Reuters商业环境
EU humanitarian chief urges Israel to boost land access to GazaAir drops and a maritime corridor will not be enough to make up for supplies transported by trucks into Gaza, where people are on the verge of famine, the European Union's top humanitarian aid official said on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 15:29:02 GMT Q23TT6OKPZPQRG2XR2POBDSWYI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/eu-人道主义-chief-urges-israel-boost-land-access-gaza-2024-03-14/Gabriela Baczynska, Nette Noestlinger世界中东地区
Royal Caribbean suspends cruise visits to Haiti's Labadee amid gang violenceRoyal Caribbean Group has suspended cruise visits to Labadee, a secluded peninsula in Haiti, for the next seven days following months of escalating gang violence in the country, a senior company executive said in a Facebook post on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 15:17:45 GMT T2PKXTFAVZP4NEPV36BEUL2AH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/royal-caribbean-suspends-cruise-visits-haitis-labadee-amid-gang-violence-2024-03-14/Reuters世界美洲
Schumer says Israel needs 'significant course corrections' for peaceU.S. Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer said on Thursday that Israel must make "significant course corrections" to achieve lasting peace with the Palestinians. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 15:04:12 GMT 4BCV2NTSNZIGPAE7WRQSSSYBQY https://www.reuters.com/world/schumer-says-israel-needs-significant-course- Corrections-peace-2024-03-14/Patricia Zengerle世界
Gaza's displaced break their Ramadan fast with canned food in the rubbleAs the evening prayer sounded across Gaza's rubble, the Abu Rizek family broke their day's fast with a shared meal in the wreckage of their home, sadly recalling all they had lost in Israel's military campaign since last year's Muslim holy month. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 14:43:55 GMT 6CTWNUADQNMCRO6NBWZJ2W7JPY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-displaced-break-their-ramadan-fast-with-canned-food-rubble-2024-03-14/Mohammad Salem世界中东地区
Russia believed to have jammed signal on UK defence minister's plane - sourceRussia is believed to have jammed the satellite signal on an aircraft used by defence minister Grant Shapps to travel from Poland back to Britain, a government source and journalists travelling with him said on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 14:41:35 GMT BHC7GVIM2FNOPDKEDNXI5776EN https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/ Russia- believe-to-have-jammed-signal-uk-defence-ministers-plan-source-2024-03-14/Reuters世界英国
Spacex confirms loss of starship at end of third test flightSpaceX's Starship rocket, designed to eventually send astronauts to the moon and beyond, completed nearly an entire test flight on its third try on Thursday, making it farther than before through a cruise in low orbit but was destroyed during atmospheric re-entry, the company said. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 14:41:18 GMT HZ3O3PQ4DROFNJW5JHGOKZGLZI https://www.reuters.com/technology/spacex-confirms-loss-starship-end-third-test-flight-2024-03-14/Reuters技术
Swiss president to meet von der Leyen Monday to start EU-Swiss talksSwiss President Viola Amherd will meet European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen in Brussels on Monday to discuss the opening of talks to update the bilateral relationship between Switzerland and the bloc, the Swiss government said. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 14:28:43 GMT HLEJ637KSRLXZHZKFNHDH5C3PY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/swiss-president-meets-von-der-leyen-monday-start-eu-swiss-talks-2024-03-14/Reuters世界欧洲
EU agrees new firearm trade rules to curb traffickingThe European Union reached provisional agreement on Thursday on new rules to make legitimate trade in firearms more transparent in a bid to combat illegal trafficking and keep arms out of the hands of criminals. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 14:07:54 GMT BBN6RCMKPFIBLHKL26PPT67ZLI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-agree-new-firearm-trade-rules-curb-trafficking-2024-03-14/Reuters世界欧洲
